TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageFault extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 錯誤在記憶體中的表示，此錯誤可傳遞給 來建立包含錯誤的訊息。

span.span: Represents an in-memory representation of a SOAP fault that can be passed to to create a message that contains a fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當您需要記憶體中的 SOAP 錯誤 (該錯誤可加以修改並用來建立包含錯誤資訊的 SOAP 訊息) 時，請使用 類別。Use the class any time you need an in-memory SOAP fault that can be modified and used to create a SOAP message that contains the fault information. 一般來說，當您程式設計 介面時，會使用 類別。Typically, the class is used when implementing the interface. 在此情況下，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會傳遞 物件，而且您會將它用於特定的需求 (例如，您可以自訂 或記錄錯誤資訊)。In this case, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] passes the object and you use it for your specific needs (for example, you can customize the or to log fault information). 但是， 可用於需要自訂 SOAP 錯誤訊息處理的任何地方。However, can be used anywhere custom SOAP fault message handling is required. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範 最常見的使用方式。The following code example shows the most common use of . 和 都會傳入 物件，該物件可加以修改及傳回給系統 (如果是 )，或是用來執行某些與自訂錯誤相關的行為 (如果是 )。Both the and pass in a object that can be modified and returned to the system (in the case of ) or used to perform some custom fault-related behavior (in the case of ). 在此範例中， 方法會將所有的 物件轉換成 物件 (該物件包含 型別的 `GreetingFault` 物件)，並將該自訂的 傳回給 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。In this example, the method converts all objects into a object that contains a object of type `GreetingFault` and returns that customized to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/ierrorhandler.cs#6)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/ierrorhandler.vb#6)]
